channel.title: Have a problem Whonix 11 VB
channel.description:
Hello, help me please, i have a problem with open Whonix Gateway and Workstation on Virtualbox in TrueCrypt Container.
When I try to use Whonix on normal hard disk, i have not gao a problem, when i try to use on truecrypt container i have a error
"The I/O cache encountered an error while updating data in medium "lsilogicsas-0-0" (rc=VERR_INVALID_PARAMETER). Make sure there is enough free space on the disk and that the disk is working properly. Operation can be resumed afterwards."
ID ERROR: BLKCACHE_IOERR

item.title: Have a problem Whonix 11 VB
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
So your problem is not a Whonix problem, but one that would happen with any VirtualBox VM. Therefore, this isn’t the best place to ask. See also:

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Based_on_Debian
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Support

The error message indicates, that the encrypted volume is too small.

Also encrypted images are very difficult to use effectively. More info:

Whonix

Advanced Security Guide

Computer Security Guide for Whonix Linux for Advanced Users, Whonix Hardening

Better use full disk encryption:

Whonix

Advanced Security Guide

Computer Security Guide for Whonix Linux for Advanced Users, Whonix Hardening

Read full topic
